mapper.select: select h.hashTagNo, h.hashTag from hashtag h join hashtagmapping m on h.hashTagNo = m.hashTagNo where m.problemNo = #{problemNo}
select p.problemNo, p.title, p.uid, p.starScore from hashtagmapping m join problem p on m.problemNo = p.problemNo where m.hashTagNo = #{hashTagNo}
select problemNo, title, uid, starScore from problem where title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into problem (multipleChoice, title, uid, contents, categorySmallNo, type) values(#{multipleChoice}, #{title}, #{uid},#{contents},#{categorySmallNo},#{type})
